languages.text: "Мне сказали, что тебя разжаловали. Как так вышло?"
"I was told you had been discharged. How did that happen?"
languages.original_text: "Мне сказали, что тебя разжаловали. Как так вышло?"

traits.locale_text: "I was told you had been demoted. How did that happen?"
"I was told you had been demoted. How did that happen?"
"I was told you had been demoted. How did that happen?"
"I was told you had been demoted. How did that happen?"
"I was told you had been discharged. How did that happen?"
"I was told you had been discharged. How did that happen?"

languages.text: 「君はすでに釈放されたと聞いた。どういう経緯でそうなったんだ？」
languages.original_text: "I was told you had been discharged. How did that happen?"

traits.locale_text: 「君はすでに釈放されたと聞いた。どういう経緯でそうなったんだ？」

languages.text: "Mir wurde gesagt, dass Ihr entlassen wurdet. Wie ist das geschehen?"
languages.original_text: "I was told you had been discharged. How did that happen?"

traits.locale_text: "Mir wurde gesagt, dass Ihr entlassen wurdet. Wie ist das geschehen?"

languages.text: « J'ai entendu dire que vous avez été destitué. Comment est-ce arrivé ? »
languages.original_text: "I was told you had been discharged. How did that happen?"

traits.locale_text: « J'ai entendu dire que vous avez été destitué. Comment est-ce arrivé ? »

languages.text: «Me han dicho que ya no pertenece al Arbites. ¿Cómo ha ocurrido?».
languages.original_text: "I was told you had been discharged. How did that happen?"

traits.locale_text: «Me han dicho que ya no pertenece al Arbites. ¿Cómo ha ocurrido?».

languages.text: “我听说你被免职了，这是怎么回事？”
languages.original_text: "I was told you had been discharged. How did that happen?"

traits.locale_text: “我听说你被免职了，这是怎么回事？”

languages.text: "Bana senin azledildiğin söylenmişti. Bu nasıl oldu?"
languages.original_text: "I was told you had been discharged. How did that happen?"

traits.locale_text: "Bana senin azledildiğin söylenmişti. Bu nasıl oldu?"
